foreignData.name: Annäherung der Fragmente
foreignData.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Ebene, einer Insel, einem Sumpf und einem Gebirge. Zeige diese Karten offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Convergencia de fragmentos
foreignData.text: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de llanura, una carta de isla, una carta de pantano y una carta de montaña. Muestra esas cartas y ponlas en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignData.name: Convergence d'éclats
foreignData.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de plaine, une carte d'île, une carte de marais et une carte de montagne. Révélez ces cartes et mettez-les dans votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignData.name: Convergenza dei Frammenti
foreignData.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Pianura, una carta Isola, una carta Palude e una carta Montagna. Rivela queste carte e aggiungile alla tua mano. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: アラーラはもう壊れてはいない。
foreignData.name: 断片の収斂
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーから、平地カード１枚と島カード１枚と沼カード１枚と山カード１枚を探す。 それらのカードを公開してあなたの手札に加える。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignData.name: Convergência de Fragmento
foreignData.text: Procure em seu grimório um card de Planície, Ilha, Pântano e Montanha. Revele-os e coloque-os na sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignData.flavorText: Алара больше не разбита на осколки.
foreignData.name: Единение Осколков
foreignData.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту Равнины, карту Острова, карту Болота и карту Горы. Покажите те карты и положите их в вашу руку. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignData.name: 断片交会
foreignData.text: 从你牌库中搜寻一张平原牌，一张海岛牌，一张沼泽牌，以及一张山脉牌。 展示这些牌并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

name: Shard Convergence
originalText: Search your library for a Plains card, an Island card, a Swamp card, and a Mountain card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: You don’t have to find all four cards.

Shard Convergence checks for cards with the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, and Mountain, not for cards with those names. You may find nonbasic land cards this way, as long as they have appropriate subtypes.

You may find “dual lands” with Shard Convergence. The Plains card you find, for example, can have a second subtype. What subtypes it has won’t impact what other cards you can find. For example, you may find a Hallowed Fountain (which has subtypes Plains and Island) as the Plains card, and another Hallowed Fountain as the Island card.

text: Search your library for a Plains card, an Island card, a Swamp card, and a Mountain card. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
